system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice.Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

As a Mechanical Engineers with Master's Degree, your work involves perform engineering duties in planning and designing tools, engines, machines, and other mechanically functioning equipment. oversee installation, operation, maintenance, and repair of equipment such as centralized heat, gas, water, and steam systems.

You approach tasks with inventive and creative and sophisticated in arts and music. you are known for being reliable in commitments and persistent in tasks. in your interactions, you are energetic in approach, expressive in communication, and confident in social situations. when working with others, you are considerate of others, harmonious in relationships, and helpful to others. under pressure, you are emotionally stable and handles stress well.
